gold.user: User requests to list all SIP domains associated with their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: A JSON response containing an array of SIP domains with their details.

gold.user: User wants to create a new SIP domain for handling VoIP calls.
gold.ideal: A JSON response confirming the creation of the SIP domain with its SID and details.

gold.user: User needs to fetch details of a specific SIP domain using its SID.
gold.ideal: A JSON response containing the details of the specified SIP domain.

gold.user: User wants to update the configuration of an existing SIP domain.
gold.ideal: A JSON response confirming the update of the SIP domain with the new details.

gold.user: User intends to delete a specific SIP domain that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: A JSON response confirming the deletion of the SIP domain.
